excessInventory.title: Excess Inventory Alert
excessInventory.summary: Current weeks of supply (8.5) exceeds optimal range
excessInventory.description: Your inventory levels indicate 8.5 weeks of supply, above the target range of 6-7 weeks. This may lead to increased carrying costs and markdown pressure.
excessInventory.action2: Accelerate markdown cadence on slow-moving items

strongRevenue.title: Strong Revenue Growth
strongRevenue.description: Your revenue performance is exceeding expectations. Consider capitalizing on this momentum with strategic investments in top-performing categories.
strongRevenue.action1: Analyze top-performing SKUs for reorder opportunities

stockOut.title: Stock-Out Rate Elevated
stockOut.summary: 3.2% of SKUs currently out of stock
stockOut.description: Your stock-out rate is approaching the warning threshold. This represents potential lost sales and customer dissatisfaction.
stockOut.action1: Review stock-out items and prioritize replenishment

markdownTiming.title: Markdown Timing Optimization
markdownTiming.summary: Delaying markdowns by 2 weeks could improve margin by 1.2pp
markdownTiming.description: Based on historical patterns, your markdown cadence appears to be earlier than optimal. A strategic delay could preserve margin while still achieving sell-through targets.
markdownTiming.action1: Test delayed markdown strategy in select categories
markdownTiming.action2: Monitor sell-through rates closely during test period

seasonalPattern.title: Seasonal Pattern Detected
seasonalPattern.summary: 6-month seasonal cycle identified in sales data
seasonalPattern.description: A repeating seasonal pattern has been identified in your data with a cycle of 6 periods and 78% pattern strength.
seasonalPattern.action2: Align inventory builds with seasonal peaks

accessoriesGrowth.title: Accessories Category Growing Fast
accessoriesGrowth.description: The Accessories category is significantly outpacing other categories. Consider increasing buy allocation and marketing support.
